mapper.select: select id, agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie from projects.agent where id = #{id}
select id, agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie from projects.agent limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into projects.agent(agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie) values (#{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{branchid}, #{agentZw}, #{agentTicheng}, #{agentPhone}, #{agentAddress}, #{agentBz}, #{purchasePom}, #{salePom}, #{stockPom}, #{agentStatie})

insert into projects.agent(agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie) values
(#{entity.agentId}, #{entity.agentName}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.agentZw}, #{entity.agentTicheng}, #{entity.agentPhone}, #{entity.agentAddress}, #{entity.agentBz}, #{entity.purchasePom}, #{entity.salePom}, #{entity.stockPom}, #{entity.agentStatie})

insert into projects.agent(agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie) values
(#{entity.agentId}, #{entity.agentName}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.agentZw}, #{entity.agentTicheng}, #{entity.agentPhone}, #{entity.agentAddress}, #{entity.agentBz}, #{entity.purchasePom}, #{entity.salePom}, #{entity.stockPom}, #{entity.agentStatie})
on duplicate key update agent_id = values(agent_id) , agent_name = values(agent_name) , branchid = values(branchid) , agent_zw = values(agent_zw) , agent_ticheng = values(agent_ticheng) , agent_phone = values(agent_phone) , agent_address = values(agent_address) , agent_bz = values(agent_bz) , purchase_pom = values(purchase_pom) , sale_pom = values(sale_pom) , stock_pom = values(stock_pom) , agent_statie = values(agent_statie)
mapper.update:
update projects.agent
agent_id = #{agentId},
agent_name = #{agentName},
branchid = #{branchid},
agent_zw = #{agentZw},
agent_ticheng = #{agentTicheng},
agent_phone = #{agentPhone},
agent_address = #{agentAddress},
agent_bz = #{agentBz},
purchase_pom = #{purchasePom},
sale_pom = #{salePom},
stock_pom = #{stockPom},
agent_statie = #{agentStatie},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM agent a LEFT JOIN branch b ON a.`branchid`=b.branchid WHERE b.`branchid` = #{id}

select id, agent_id, agent_name, branchid, agent_zw, agent_ticheng, agent_phone, agent_address, agent_bz, purchase_pom, sale_pom, stock_pom, agent_statie from projects.agent where branchid = #{branchid}
